## Source: ossf-package-analysis (447e0e40d99f975438792b85715ae48b89f8fd877e0c44b434643a73ca19731c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'beanstalk-api' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
